channel.title: admin on Karthik C.
channel.description: Recent content in admin on Karthik C.

item.description: I am an Undergraduate NLP Researcher at the Language Technologies Research Center, IIIT Hyderabad. Currently, I am working on adversarial text generation, but I’m also generally interested in generative models and work on side projects on the same. I also have experience building commercial NLP tools using ML/DL. Outside CS and ML, I love football, music, art and speedcubing.
